About the Company: Radaan Mediaworks India Ltd is engaged in the business of production of mega tele-serials, tele-films, films, computer graphics and animations, events show etc.Raadans progammes address diverse genres: family drama, sitcoms, thrillers, format game shows, telefilms and feature films.The services offered by the company includes Television software,Digital graphics,Imaging,Special effects and Organizing live events.
